code:

  description: "As a Data Scientist on the Consumer Analytics team, you will collaborate with cross-functional partners on a wide range of complex problems. This role will support both acquisition and retention efforts across all channels and platforms including  online and offline, paid and organic, on-site and in-app.",

Diagnose and communicate root causes of changes in user behavior metrics", "Develop a keen understanding of how our acquisition strategies impact loyalty and how we should allocate our resources or evolve the product as a result", "Build dashboards to showcase and disseminate key insights throughout organization", "Create reusable datasets with appropriate architecture using our complex data pipeline", "Partner with the business and engineering to ensure that we are collecting appropriate data and are utilizing the appropriate frameworks to analyze our performance"]

  type_span: "Fulltime",
  description: "We are a team on a mission, to put accessible and affordable healthcare in the hands of every person on earth.To help with that, we’re looking for talented and driven analysts to work in our product analytics function. You’ll be helping to drive the development of one of our key strategic products by embedding in that tribe and making sure they’re working in a data rich environment while shaping and delivering key pieces of strategic analysis. ",
  work: ["Defining/reviewing KPIs with stakeholders", " Visualising data", " Training users to self serve their data needs ", " Proactively identifying opportunities to use data to guide product development", " Executing and delivering high impact analysis to inform strategic and tactical decision making"]
}, {

  type: "Cabify",
  type_span: "Fulltime",
  description: "As a Data Scientist on the Consumer Analytics team, you will collaborate with cross-functional partners on a wide range of complex problems. You'll use data to help grow and evolve the rental products that exist today and your insights will help shape the company roadmap. You'll be responsible for driving insights that support decision-making in the consumer space. This role will support both acquisition and retention efforts across all channels and platforms including  online and offline, paid and organic, on-site and in-app.",

}, {
  id: 4,

  title: "Software Developer",
  banner_desktop: "/images/jobopening_banners/Desktop/Chime-banner-2.png",
  banner_mobile: "/images/jobopening_banners/Mobile/Chime-banner-mobile.png",
  type: "Chime",
  type_span: "Fulltime",
  description: "Chime is looking for an engineer eager to grow expertise in building technology that powers our mobile app. This position will span a large range of the tech stack from new API architecture and design for mobile client consumption, to the execution of new microservices that power relevant domains.",
  work: ["Design and implement APIs working closely with the mobile team to ship product efficiently", "Design, develop, test, refactor and scale backend implementations of new and existing consumer product features", "Work closely with our product team to launch new features", " Develop thoroughly tested code and conduct quality assurance on all new code alongside our QA team", "Collaborate effectively with other technology teams and architects to solve complex problems spanning their respective areas", "Work in a team as well as independently and deliver on aggressive schedules and goals"]
}, {
  id: 5,

  banner_mobile: "/images/jobopening_banners/Mobile/Faire-banner-mobile.png",
  type: "Faire",
  type_span: "Fulltime",
  description: "As a Data Scientist on the Consumer Analytics team, you will collaborate with cross-functional partners on a wide range of complex problems. You'll use data to help grow and evolve the rental products that exist today and your insights will help shape the company roadmap. You'll be responsible for driving insights that support decision-making in the consumer space. This role will support both acquisition and retention efforts across all channels and platforms including  online and offline, paid and organic, on-site and in-app.",
  work: ["Deliver core features of our Kotlin/Java 8 server", "Design and build new APIs used by our website and mobile app.", "Lead the technical aspects of projects that have strategic impact at Faire", "Write integration tests for everything", "Own the long term roadmap for major areas of the technology stack.", "Independently prioritize projects and handle execution ", "Introduce improvements that help the entire team become more productive and ship higher quality work", "Act as a contributor in evolving the architecture and design of our backend."]
}, {
  id: 6,
  src: "/images/logos/Lalamove.png",
  title: "UX Researcher",
  banner_desktop: "/images/jobopening_banners/Desktop/Lalamove-banner-1.png",
  banner_mobile: "/images/jobopening_banners/Mobile/Lalamove-banner-mobile.png",
  type: "Lalamove",

  description: "We are looking for a UX Researcher who is inspired by people, loves understanding why people behave the way they do, and has the technical skills to dig deep into  motivations. You will be responsible for defining problem statements, determining research time frames or budgets, conducting different user research methods,  forming insights and translating them into appropriate deliverables including reports, journey maps, presentations, and wireframes. You will work closely with the Product Managers, UX/UI Designers, Data Analyst, and other departments for the purpose of  promoting the best practices in user research.",
  work: ["Define, plan, and conduct user research at every stage of the product’s  lifecycle; from concept to design to production (define problems;  create personas, evaluations, user-flows/journeys, user-feedback, analyze quantitative and qualitative user research; work with  designers to build prototypes, etc.)  ", "Provide customer insights from people across different regions where Lalamove operates to help drive evidence-based product and design decisions", "Collaborate with other team members (designers, product managers, data analyst) to identify best practices and establish a data-driven, human-centric approach", "Liaise with other user researchers in the co-development and tracking of user-research needs and goals to ensure that user research is consistently supporting product initiatives."]
}, {

  type_span: "Fulltime",
  description: "Prospa is driven by its people. Their diversity, skills and passion are the foundation of what we deliver to our customers – where employees are dedicated to achieving stellar results and exceeding customer expectations. You will be responsible for creating user facing features. You will work closely with Design to bridge the gap between their graphical design and the technical implementation. You will work closely with the rest of the software engineering team so that you can consume their APIs and ensure that the full end to end experience meets the functional and UX/UI aspects of the Design and Product teams",
  work: ["Consulting with UX/UI about implementation of design", "Building the UI for Prospa’s products", "Building and maintaining reusable code and libraries for future use", "Code review other team members work paying attention to patterns and practices of the team", "Documentation and knowledge sharing", "Keeping abreast of technology changes and keeping Prospa on the leading but not bleeding edge of change"]
}, {

If you are passionate about data, impact generation and skilled in: R, SQL, excel and data visualization we are looking for you.",
  work: ["Achieve comprehensive analysis of Rappi DB", "Dig in and develop methodologies to find insights and opportunities.", "Prepare daily, weekly and monthly statistical reports", "Help us generate strategies that benefit the business ", "Generate dashboards and visual tools for the business team.", "Stablish follow up and results measurements procedures."]
}, {
  id: 9,

Your main weapons will be SQL, dashboards, and a thorough  understanding of our business. You will also be acting as a bridge between product owners and  engineers.",
  work: ["Understand our business and its processes through our data", "Apply this understanding and knowledge of our data to help product and services teams", "Design key metrics to measure different aspects of the business", "Create and maintain new aggregated views and tables to simplify data querying", " Maintain and create new dashboards to track metrics and visualise insights", "Promote data literacy across the company, organise and hold workshops"]
}];

sourcesContent:
export const data = [
  {
    id: 1,
    src: "/images/logos/Rent_The_Runway.jfif",
    title: " Data Scientist-Consumer Analytics",
    banner_desktop: "/images/jobopening_banners/Desktop/rtr-banner-2.png",
    banner_mobile: "/images/jobopening_banners/Mobile/rtr-banner-mobile-3.png",
    type: " Rent The Runway",
    type_span: "Fulltime",
    description:
      "As a Data Scientist on the Consumer Analytics team, you will collaborate with cross-functional partners on a wide range of complex problems. You'll use data to help grow and evolve the rental products that exist today and your insights will help shape the company roadmap. You'll be responsible for driving insights that support decision-making in the consumer space. This role will support both acquisition and retention efforts across all channels and platforms including  online and offline, paid and organic, on-site and in-app.",
    work: [
      "Apply expertise in quantitative analysis to see beyond the numbers and extract actionable insights on how our customers use our different services and derive value",
      "Build statistical models that describe and predict user behavior",
      "Frame up and administer A/B tests and experiments aimed at improving KPI performance (conversions, churn, etc.)",
      "Design and evaluate experiments that impact user behavior. Diagnose and communicate root causes of changes in user behavior metrics",
      "Develop a keen understanding of how our acquisition strategies impact loyalty and how we should allocate our resources or evolve the product as a result",
      "Build dashboards to showcase and disseminate key insights throughout organization",
      "Create reusable datasets with appropriate architecture using our complex data pipeline",
      "Partner with the business and engineering to ensure that we are collecting appropriate data and are utilizing the appropriate frameworks to analyze our performance",
    ],
  },
  {
    id: 2,
    src: "/images/logos/babylonhealth.png",
    title: "Product Analyst",
    banner_desktop: "/images/jobopening_banners/Desktop/babylon-banner-1.png",
    banner_mobile:
      "/images/jobopening_banners/Mobile/babylon-banner-mobile.png",
    type: "Babylon Health",
    type_span: "Fulltime",
    description:
      "We are a team on a mission, to put accessible and affordable healthcare in the hands of every person on earth.To help with that, we’re looking for talented and driven analysts to work in our product analytics function. You’ll be helping to drive the development of one of our key strategic products by embedding in that tribe and making sure they’re working in a data rich environment while shaping and delivering key pieces of strategic analysis. ",
    work: [
      "Defining/reviewing KPIs with stakeholders",
      " Visualising data",
      " Training users to self serve their data needs ",
      " Proactively identifying opportunities to use data to guide product development",
      " Executing and delivering high impact analysis to inform strategic and tactical decision making",
    ],
  },
  {
    id: 3,
    src: "/images/logos/Cabify.jfif",
    title: "Data Analyst",
    banner_desktop: "/images/jobopening_banners/Desktop/Cabify-banner-1.png",
    banner_mobile: "/images/jobopening_banners/Mobile/Cabify-banner-mobile.png",
    type: "Cabify",
    type_span: "Fulltime",
    description:
      "As a Data Scientist on the Consumer Analytics team, you will collaborate with cross-functional partners on a wide range of complex problems. You'll use data to help grow and evolve the rental products that exist today and your insights will help shape the company roadmap. You'll be responsible for driving insights that support decision-making in the consumer space. This role will support both acquisition and retention efforts across all channels and platforms including  online and offline, paid and organic, on-site and in-app.",
    work: [
      "Leverage data to perform intensive analysis across all areas of our business to improve operational efficiency and streamline process.",
      "Generate and execute on ideas for exploratory analysis to shape future projects and provide  recommendations for actions",
      "Create dashboards and reports to regularly communicate results and monitor key metrics",
      "Use data visualization to distill complicated spatio-temporal data into easy to digest summaries that are used to monitor health and inform product",
      "Present findings to senior management to guide business decisions",
      "Collaborate with cross-functional teams across disciplines such as Growth or Product",
    ],
  },

  {
    id: 4,
    src: "/images/logos/chime.png",
    title: "Software Developer",
    banner_desktop: "/images/jobopening_banners/Desktop/Chime-banner-2.png",
    banner_mobile: "/images/jobopening_banners/Mobile/Chime-banner-mobile.png",
    type: "Chime",
    type_span: "Fulltime",
    description:
      "Chime is looking for an engineer eager to grow expertise in building technology that powers our mobile app. This position will span a large range of the tech stack from new API architecture and design for mobile client consumption, to the execution of new microservices that power relevant domains.",
    work: [
      "Design and implement APIs working closely with the mobile team to ship product efficiently",
      "Design, develop, test, refactor and scale backend implementations of new and existing consumer product features",
      "Work closely with our product team to launch new features",
      " Develop thoroughly tested code and conduct quality assurance on all new code alongside our QA team",
      "Collaborate effectively with other technology teams and architects to solve complex problems spanning their respective areas",
      "Work in a team as well as independently and deliver on aggressive schedules and goals",
    ],
  },

  {
    id: 5,
    src: "/images/logos/faire.jfif",
    title: "Backend Development Intern",
    banner_desktop: "/images/jobopening_banners/Desktop/Faire-banner-1.png",
    banner_mobile: "/images/jobopening_banners/Mobile/Faire-banner-mobile.png",
    type: "Faire",
    type_span: "Fulltime",
    description:
      "As a Data Scientist on the Consumer Analytics team, you will collaborate with cross-functional partners on a wide range of complex problems. You'll use data to help grow and evolve the rental products that exist today and your insights will help shape the company roadmap. You'll be responsible for driving insights that support decision-making in the consumer space. This role will support both acquisition and retention efforts across all channels and platforms including  online and offline, paid and organic, on-site and in-app.",
    work: [
      "Deliver core features of our Kotlin/Java 8 server",
      "Design and build new APIs used by our website and mobile app.",
      "Lead the technical aspects of projects that have strategic impact at Faire",
      "Write integration tests for everything",
      "Own the long term roadmap for major areas of the technology stack.",
      "Independently prioritize projects and handle execution ",
      "Introduce improvements that help the entire team become more productive and ship higher quality work",
      "Act as a contributor in evolving the architecture and design of our backend.",
    ],
  },

  {
    id: 6,
    src: "/images/logos/Lalamove.png",
    title: "UX Researcher",
    banner_desktop: "/images/jobopening_banners/Desktop/Lalamove-banner-1.png",
    banner_mobile:
      "/images/jobopening_banners/Mobile/Lalamove-banner-mobile.png",
    type: "Lalamove",
    type_span: "Fulltime",
    description:
      "We are looking for a UX Researcher who is inspired by people, loves understanding why people behave the way they do, and has the technical skills to dig deep into  motivations. You will be responsible for defining problem statements, determining research time frames or budgets, conducting different user research methods,  forming insights and translating them into appropriate deliverables including reports, journey maps, presentations, and wireframes. You will work closely with the Product Managers, UX/UI Designers, Data Analyst, and other departments for the purpose of  promoting the best practices in user research.",
    work: [
      "Define, plan, and conduct user research at every stage of the product’s  lifecycle; from concept to design to production (define problems;  create personas, evaluations, user-flows/journeys, user-feedback, analyze quantitative and qualitative user research; work with  designers to build prototypes, etc.)  ",
      "Provide customer insights from people across different regions where Lalamove operates to help drive evidence-based product and design decisions",
      "Collaborate with other team members (designers, product managers, data analyst) to identify best practices and establish a data-driven, human-centric approach",
      "Liaise with other user researchers in the co-development and tracking of user-research needs and goals to ensure that user research is consistently supporting product initiatives.",
    ],
  },

  {
    id: 7,
    src: "/images/logos/Prospa.png",
    title: "Front End Development Internship",
    banner_desktop: "/images/jobopening_banners/Desktop/Prospa-banner-2.png",
    banner_mobile: "/images/jobopening_banners/Mobile/Prospa-banner-mobile.png",
    type: "Prospa",
    type_span: "Fulltime",
    description:
      "Prospa is driven by its people. Their diversity, skills and passion are the foundation of what we deliver to our customers – where employees are dedicated to achieving stellar results and exceeding customer expectations. You will be responsible for creating user facing features. You will work closely with Design to bridge the gap between their graphical design and the technical implementation. You will work closely with the rest of the software engineering team so that you can consume their APIs and ensure that the full end to end experience meets the functional and UX/UI aspects of the Design and Product teams",
    work: [
      "Consulting with UX/UI about implementation of design",
      "Building the UI for Prospa’s products",
      "Building and maintaining reusable code and libraries for future use",
      "Code review other team members work paying attention to patterns and practices of the team",
      "Documentation and knowledge sharing",
      "Keeping abreast of technology changes and keeping Prospa on the leading but not bleeding edge of change",
    ],
  },

  {
    id: 8,
    src: "/images/logos/rappi.png",
    title: " Business Intelligence - (BI) Analyst",
    banner_desktop: "/images/jobopening_banners/Desktop/Rappi-banner-1.png",
    banner_mobile: "/images/jobopening_banners/Mobile/Rappi-banner-mobile.png",
    type: "Rappi",
    type_span: "Fulltime",
    description:
      "We have identified the need of a brilliant Business Intelligence Analyst, who is able to deep div  into the company's DB to identify opportunities and insights, that will serve as the raw material of these strategic plans that will help Rappi to fulfill its middle and long term objectives. If you are passionate about data, impact generation and skilled in: R, SQL, excel and data visualization we are looking for you.",
    work: [
      "Achieve comprehensive analysis of Rappi DB",
      "Dig in and develop methodologies to find insights and opportunities.",
      "Prepare daily, weekly and monthly statistical reports",
      "Help us generate strategies that benefit the business ",
      "Generate dashboards and visual tools for the business team.",
      "Stablish follow up and results measurements procedures.",
    ],
  },

  {
    id: 9,
    src: "/images/logos/revolut.png",
    title: "Data Analyst",
    banner_desktop: "/images/jobopening_banners/Desktop/Revolut-banner-1.png",
    banner_mobile:
      "/images/jobopening_banners/Mobile/Revolut-banner-mobile.png",
    type: "Revolut",
    type_span: "Fulltime",
    description:
      "We are looking for smart and ambitious people who would help us understand our data better.  Right now we need at least one Data Analyst to join the Support Analytics team. This is a unique  opportunity to learn about many aspects of our business and be involved in the early stages of  an innovative new product. Your main weapons will be SQL, dashboards, and a thorough  understanding of our business. You will also be acting as a bridge between product owners and  engineers.",
    work: [
      "Understand our business and its processes through our data",
      "Apply this understanding and knowledge of our data to help product and services teams",
      "Design key metrics to measure different aspects of the business",
      "Create and maintain new aggregated views and tables to simplify data querying",
      " Maintain and create new dashboards to track metrics and visualise insights",
      "Promote data literacy across the company, organise and hold workshops",
    ],
  },
];
